name: FirstTry
description:
Welcome To FirstTry.

You will have to test your skills at not just timing but also how well you can keep your cool. Will your keyboard survive?... only one way to find out.

  • Controls: -- Movement Left (A Key, Left arrow Key) -- Movement Right (D Key, Right arrow key) -- Jumping (W Key, Up arrow key, Spacebar) -- Pause Menu (Escape key)
  • Has support for Controllers/Gamepads IN GAME ONLY! Does not work in main menu.

--NOTE: THERE IS NO GAME CHECKPOINTS OR SAVES!--
